items.sentence: I wonder how long Tom has been living in Boston.
Tom listens to the radio whenever he\'s driving.
Tom and Mary ran into each other at the station.
Tom and Mary watched a romantic comedy together.
Tom and Mary were both talking at the same time.
Tom and Mary were only married for a few months.
Tom and his staff are preparing for the meeting.
Why is taking pictures of trains so interesting?
We hope to reach the summit before it gets dark.
Why do you have a picture of Tom in your wallet?
To get to the museum, you need to take that bus.
Tom Jackson is one of the richest men in Boston.
Tom accidentally cut himself with his new knife.
Tom doesn\'t sound like a native French speaker.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary will be able to do that.
Tom doesn\'t think doing this is worth our time.
Do you really have free tickets for the concert?
Do you still need a babysitter for Monday night?
I don\'t think that that\'s why Tom isn\'t here.
Tom and Mary arrived in Boston at the same time.
